column5: Hi all,  I'm new to this site.  I am planning a fishing trip for me and my girlfriend.  She is a newbie when it comes to fishing.  She would like to experience a fishing trip with me.  Does anyone have any advice where there are good resorts this time of year I can bring her to.   John

Welcome to the board....  May need to provide some more info to get some feedback: *Where you coming from?  How long to you want to travel? *How much do you want to spend? *Camp vs. Cabin *Need a boat rental *ETC, ETC, ETC. I"m sure you'll get some info, just give this vast pool of "knowledge" some direction!  dk

Welcome aboard and I would start your search by checking this site out. Lots of great camps to choose from.  Click here to got to OFC Directory  Just choose and area and go from there. When you get it narrowed down ask on here for more info on certain places and I'm sure someone has been there or knows of it to help out. I don't think you can go wrong with the Nipissing area this time of the year. There's always fish being caught up there.  Good Luck with it.
Hi all,  I will need a boat rental.  Any ideas of  cottage rental.  We are open to any area.
